p: SARS-CoV Mpro was downloaded from the PDB (PDB ID: 1q2w). Blast [ 61] was run on the basis of the amino acid sequence. As a result, 2643 sequences of viral main proteases similar to chain A SARS-CoV Mpro were obtained. Clustal Omega [ 62] was used to prepare an alignment of those sequences. Comulator [ 33] was then employed to calculate the correlation between amino acids and, on the basis of the results, groups of positions in SARS-CoV Mpro sequence were selected whose amino acid occurrences strongly depended on each other.
